name: Webchromic: The Best Webcomics
description: Bring the best webcomics to your homepage.
author: Rounak Banik
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://xkcd.com/info.0.json http://thisisindexed.com/ http://abstrusegoose.com/ http://carbon-comic.com/ http://www.incidentalcomics.com/ http://spikedmath.com/ http://sarahcandersen.com/ http://abstrusegoose.com/ http://www.buttercupfestival.com/ http://oglaf.com/ http://www.girlgeniusonline.com/comic.php http://theawkwardyeti.com/ http://poorlydrawnlines.com/ http://www.awkwardzombie.com/; object-src 'self'
